Moreover, may we in every life, in every place,
Be reborn through lotus flowers, with a noble and superior family lineage.
May we have peace and happiness, with clothing and food provided naturally.
Moreover, may we in every life, in every place,
Be kind, benevolent, loyal, and filial, and equally compassionate towards all beings.
May we not give rise to a single thought of rebellious or harmful intent.
May I in life after life, in every place,
Always be protected and remembered by the buddhas.
Able to subdue demons, enemies, and non-Buddhists,
And gather together with the bodhisattvas in one place.
The mind of the Way continues without interruption.
May I in life after life, in every place,
Flourish the Buddha Dharma and practice the Great Vehicle.
Manifesting countless bodies to save and liberate sentient beings.
Until reaching the Way-place, without turning back.
As the vows made by the buddhas and bodhisattvas,
The merit and wisdom cultivated, and the practices dedicated,
I also do the same.
Making vows to cultivate and dedicate until the end of space,
The end of the realm of sentient beings,
The end of the karma and afflictions of sentient beings, my cultivation and dedication will never come to an end.
Having made the vows and dedications,
With utmost sincerity, I pay homage to the eternally abiding Three Jewels.
